alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 12:52PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Alachua, north central Marion and west central Putnam Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1252 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rochelle, or 11 miles northwest of Citra, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Interlachen, Hawthorne, Rochelle, Cross Creek, Orange Springs, Newnans Lake, Micanopy, McIntosh, Hog Valley and Johnson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Marion; Western Putnam
